title: Pixel Launcher preps search shortcuts for Maps, Play Store, and YouTube
content:
With Android 12, the Pixel Launcher introduced a new on-device search experience at the top of the app launcher. While it’s temporarily gone from Android 13 Beta 1, the Pixel Launcher is working on search shortcuts beyond the Google app.

more…

The post Pixel Launcher preps search shortcuts for Maps, Play Store, and YouTube appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: With Android 12, the Pixel Launcher introduced a new on-device search experience at the top of the app launcher, and more shortcuts...
